question: During which month (i.e. January, February, March,...) is the average {col} level the {stats} across India ?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_pickle("preprocessed/main_data.pkl")
    data = main_data.groupby(main_data["Timestamp"].dt.month_name())["{code_col}"].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="{code_col}")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["Timestamp"])




true_code()
